        RELEASE NAME ..... Norton Ghost v14.0
        SUPPLIER ......... Team EDGE
        CRACKER .......... Team EDGE
        PROTECTION ....... Custom Activation
        RELEASE DATE ..... 22/02/2008
        SIZE ............. 01 x 5MB
        URL .............. http://www.symantec.com/

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

                               Norton Ghost v14.0

   This nice keygen goes well together with the 0day release of the trial
   version Symantec_Norton_Ghost_v14.0-BLACKSTAR from 19-02-2008, we think
   p2p serials blows :)

   Symantec Ghost 14.0 protects PCs including all applications, settings,
   folders, and files with advanced backup and recovery.

   It provides powerful protection with new features such as offsite backups
   and Symantec ThreatCon integration, as well as enhanced performance,
   remote management, LightsOut Restore capability, and more.

   FEATURES:

    - Offsite backup to FTP server.
    - Symantec ThreatCon integration.
    - Full system backups (disk image).
    - Files and folders backup.
    - Offsite backup to FTP.
    - Incremental and differential backup.
    - Customizable, event-based backup.
    - LightsOut Restore.
    - Remote management.
    - Google Desktop Search.
    - Virtualization conversion wizard.

   SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

    - Windows XP SP2 Home / Professional.
    - 300MHz processor or higher.
    - 256MB RAM (512MB recommended).
    - 400MB free hard disk space.
    - Windows Vista Home Starter/Home Premium/Business/Ultimate.
      (Must meet the minimum system requirement of Windows Vista).
    - CD-ROM or DVD drive for software distribution on media.
    - Super VGA (800x600) resolution or higher video adapter and monitor.

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

   1. Use the keygen located in the EDGE dir to activate.

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  WE ARE DEDICATED TO QUALITY, NOT QUANTITY, AND WE ARE DOING IT FOR THE LULZ!
